column1: gene preston diminick| gene preston diminick. born: june 09
column3: 2015 gene passed quietly away on june 8
column4: 2015 while spending the last 6 months of his life in the care of his daughter and son-in-law in jacksonville
column5: fl. prior to that he was a long-time resident of ringoes
column6: nj. gene was one of 3 sons of joseph and anna diminick. he was 79 years old. gene spent his entire life taking care of his family and being a good friend to those around him. he enjoyed his second career at home depot in bridgewater
column7: nj and spoke often about the lifelong friends he made there. he enjoyed fishing and taking care of his chickens
column8: delivering fresh eggs to his friends. his children were always his most proud accomplishment. he served in the army from 1954 - 1956 during the korean war. gene was an amazing father
column10: uncle and friend. he will be missed more than words can say. he was preceded in death by his son
column11: gene christopher diminick (1969 - 2010). he is survived by his daughter
column15: minnesota and his brother jack in danville
column16: pennsylvania and many other family members in nj. as well as his ex-wife of almost 30 years
column17: beverly diminick in north myrtle beach
